AcceptConnection.name: AcceptConnection
AcceptConnection.description: Grants permission to accept a request to connect this account to an Amazon CodeCatalyst space

AssociateIamRoleToConnection.name: AssociateIamRoleToConnection
AssociateIamRoleToConnection.description: Grants permission to associate an IAM role to a connection

AssociateIdentityCenterApplicationToSpac.name: AssociateIdentityCenterApplicationToSpace
AssociateIdentityCenterApplicationToSpac.description: Grants permission to associate an IAM Identity Center application with an Amazon CodeCatalyst space

AssociateIdentityToIdentityCenterApplica.name: AssociateIdentityToIdentityCenterApplication
AssociateIdentityToIdentityCenterApplica.description: Grants permission to associate an identity with an IAM Identity Center application for an Amazon CodeCatalyst space

BatchAssociateIdentitiesToIdentityCenter.name: BatchAssociateIdentitiesToIdentityCenterApplication
BatchAssociateIdentitiesToIdentityCenter.description: Grants permission to associate multiple identities with an IAM Identity Center application for an Amazon CodeCatalyst space

BatchDisassociateIdentitiesFromIdentityC.name: BatchDisassociateIdentitiesFromIdentityCenterApplication
BatchDisassociateIdentitiesFromIdentityC.description: Grants permission to disassociate multiple identities from an IAM Identity Center application for an Amazon CodeCatalyst space

CreateIdentityCenterApplication.name: CreateIdentityCenterApplication
CreateIdentityCenterApplication.description: Grants permission to create an IAM Identity Center application

CreateSpace.name: CreateSpace
CreateSpace.description: Grants permission to create an Amazon CodeCatalyst space

CreateSpaceAdminRoleAssignment.name: CreateSpaceAdminRoleAssignment
CreateSpaceAdminRoleAssignment.description: Grants permission to create an administrator role assignment for a given Amazon CodeCatalyst space and IAM Identity Center application

DeleteConnection.name: DeleteConnection
DeleteConnection.description: Grants permission to delete a connection

DeleteIdentityCenterApplication.name: DeleteIdentityCenterApplication
DeleteIdentityCenterApplication.description: Grants permission to delete an IAM Identity Center application

DisassociateIamRoleFromConnection.name: DisassociateIamRoleFromConnection
DisassociateIamRoleFromConnection.description: Grants permission to disassociate an IAM role from a connection

DisassociateIdentityCenterApplicationFro.name: DisassociateIdentityCenterApplicationFromSpace
DisassociateIdentityCenterApplicationFro.description: Grants permission to disassociate an IAM Identity Center application from an Amazon CodeCatalyst space

DisassociateIdentityFromIdentityCenterAp.name: DisassociateIdentityFromIdentityCenterApplication
DisassociateIdentityFromIdentityCenterAp.description: Grants permission to disassociate an identity from an IAM Identity Center application for an Amazon CodeCatalyst space

GetBillingAuthorization.name: GetBillingAuthorization
GetBillingAuthorization.description: Grants permission to describe the billing authorization for a connection

GetConnection.name: GetConnection
GetConnection.description: Grants permission to get a connection

GetIdentityCenterApplication.name: GetIdentityCenterApplication
GetIdentityCenterApplication.description: Grants permission to get information about an IAM Identity Center application

GetPendingConnection.name: GetPendingConnection
GetPendingConnection.description: Grants permission to get a pending request to connect this account to an Amazon CodeCatalyst space

ListConnections.name: ListConnections
ListConnections.description: Grants permission to list connections that are not pending

ListIamRolesForConnection.name: ListIamRolesForConnection
ListIamRolesForConnection.description: Grants permission to list IAM roles associated with a connection

ListIdentityCenterApplications.name: ListIdentityCenterApplications
ListIdentityCenterApplications.description: Grants permission to view a list of all IAM Identity Center applications in the account

ListIdentityCenterApplicationsForSpace.name: ListIdentityCenterApplicationsForSpace
ListIdentityCenterApplicationsForSpace.description: Grants permission to view a list of IAM Identity Center applications by Amazon CodeCatalyst space

ListSpacesForIdentityCenterApplication.name: ListSpacesForIdentityCenterApplication
ListSpacesForIdentityCenterApplication.description: Grants permission to view a list of Amazon CodeCatalyst spaces by IAM Identity Center application

ListTagsForResource.name: ListTagsForResource
ListTagsForResource.description: Grants permission to list tags for an Amazon CodeCatalyst resource

PutBillingAuthorization.name: PutBillingAuthorization
PutBillingAuthorization.description: Grants permission to create or update the billing authorization for a connection

RejectConnection.name: RejectConnection
RejectConnection.description: Grants permission to reject a request to connect this account to an Amazon CodeCatalyst space

SynchronizeIdentityCenterApplication.name: SynchronizeIdentityCenterApplication
SynchronizeIdentityCenterApplication.description: Grants permission to synchronize an IAM Identity Center application with the backing identity store

TagResource.name: TagResource
TagResource.description: Grants permission to tag an Amazon CodeCatalyst resource

UntagResource.name: UntagResource
UntagResource.description: Grants permission to untag an Amazon CodeCatalyst resource

UpdateIdentityCenterApplication.name: UpdateIdentityCenterApplication
UpdateIdentityCenterApplication.description: Grants permission to update an IAM Identity Center application
